modShortDescription: This mod makes the chainsaw, auger and nailgun way more useful.
modDescription:
This mod makes the [chainsaw](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/), auger and nailgun way more useful.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/tree/stable/donovan-betterpowertools)**

If you find any issues or have a suggestion for improvement, please [open an issue](https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/issues) and Donovan will look into it ASAP.

**Credits:** [Donovan](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/donovan/)
